title: Final T when NH4ClO4 is added to 10x more water

content.question: When 5.0 g of NH4ClO4(s) is added to 100. mL of water in a calorimeter, the temperature of the solution formed decreases by 3.0°C. If 5.0 g of NH4ClO4(s) is added to 1000. mL of water in a calorimeter initially at 25.0°C, the final temperature of the solution will be approximately

skill.text: 2.F: Explain how modifications to an experimental procedure will alter results.
